footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Traveler | Update Date: 02/11/2024 | Editor: ._.samantha._.

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Primordial Jade Cutter__
is a great stat stick and unconditional ATK  that scales off of Max HP.

__Wolf Fang__
Battle Pass weapon, has a passive that provides CRIT Rate and DMG Bonus%.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Haran Geppaku Futsu, Mistsplitter Reforged, Summit Shaper, Light of Foliar Incision__
5-star statsticks.

__Lion’s Roar, Festering Desire, The Black Sword, Amenoma Kageuchi__
Consider them in this order of strength.

__Favonius Sword__
With enough CRIT Rate, they are the best Geo Battery.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Energy Recharge or ATK% |<goblet>  Geo DMG Bonus% |<circlet>CRIT DMG or CRIT Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Starfell Sword
**2)** Elemental Burst: Wake of Earth
**3)** Normal Attack: Foreign Rockblade

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
__Lion's Roar__
Will outperform many 5-Star weapons if the passive can be maintained, such as running Xiangling within the team. 

__Harbinger of Dawn__
Can outperform most 4-Star weapons and some 5-Star weapons but maintaining the passive may prove to be difficult. 

__4 piece Thundersoother or Lavawalker__ 
If the passive can be maintained, it is the better than 2-piece set options for DMG.
